item.title: Open Sublime with Terminal
item.description: A simple way to open sublime with terminal: Open terminal. ln -s /Applications/Sublime\Text\2.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl /usr/local/bin/subl Use subl command to edit a file.
